```{r Prep, echo=FALSE}
#Factors
##Country as factors
model_df$Country <- as.factor(model_df$Country)
levels(model_df$Country)


## Bio climatic regions
model_df$Country <- as.character(model_df$Country)

# Initialize altregion as a copy of Country
model_df$altregion <- model_df$Country

model_df[model_df$Country %in% c('Belgium', 'Denmark', 'UK'), "altregion"] <- 'Atlantic'
model_df[model_df$Country %in% c('Switzerland','Germany'), "altregion"] <- 'Temperate'

# Check the changes
table(model_df$altregion)

##Factors and transformation 
model_df$altregion <- as.factor(model_df$altregion)
levels(model_df$altregion)
```

```{r Populate Pond dries }
# Select relevant columns and keep only distinct combinations
pond_changes <- model_df %>%
  select(PondCode, season_col, year, Pond_dries, Strat) %>%
  distinct()

# Check for variability in Pond_dries_cat per pond across years/seasons
pond_dry_var <- pond_changes %>%
  group_by(PondCode) %>%
  summarise(n_unique_dry = n_distinct(Pond_dries,na.rm = T)) %>%
  filter(n_unique_dry > 1)

# View how many ponds have varying values
cat("Ponds with changes in Pond_dries_cat across years/seasons:", nrow(pond_dry_var), "\n")

pondries_var_df <- model_df[model_df$PondCode %in% pond_dry_var$PondCode,]
pondries_var_df <- pondries_var_df[,c("PondCode","season_col","year","Pond_dries")]
pondries_var_df
```

```{r bestNormalize}
library(bestNormalize)

#Area
shapiro.test(model_df$Area)
Arean <- bestNormalize(model_df$Area)
plot(Arean, leg_loc = "bottomright")
model_df$Area.t <- asinh(model_df$Area)
hist(model_df$Area.t)
shapiro.test(model_df$Area.t)

#Depth
shapiro.test(model_df$Depth)
Depthn <- bestNormalize(model_df$Depth)
plot(Depthn, leg_loc = "bottomright")
model_df$Depth.t <- predict(orderNorm(model_df$Depth))
hist(model_df$Depth.t)
shapiro.test(model_df$Depth.t)

#Animals_cont  skew
shapiro.test(model_df$Animals_cont)
Animals_contn <- bestNormalize(model_df$Animals_cont)

model_df$Animals_cont.t <- predict(orderNorm(model_df$Animals_cont))
hist(model_df$Animals_cont.t)
shapiro.test(model_df$Animals_cont.t)

#MeanT
shapiro.test(model_df$MeanT)
MeanT <- bestNormalize(model_df$MeanT)
plot(MeanT, leg_loc = "bottomright")
model_df$MeanT.t <- predict(orderNorm(model_df$MeanT))
hist(model_df$MeanT.t)
shapiro.test(model_df$MeanT.t)

#sum_P
shapiro.test(model_df$sum_P)

model_df$sum_P.t <- predict(orderNorm(model_df$sum_P))
hist(model_df$sum_P.t)
shapiro.test(model_df$sum_P.t)
```

```{r Quantile transformation}
transformar_columna <- function(x) {
  perc <- rank(x, na.last = "keep") / (sum(!is.na(x)) + 1)  # Calcular los percentiles manteniendo los NA
  result <- ifelse(!is.na(x), qnorm(perc), NA)  # Transformar los percentiles a la distribuciÃ³n normal, manteniendo los NA
  return(result)}

#Natural_5, Aquatic_500,Cropland_500,Forest_500,Pastures.and.open.nature_500,Urban_500
model_df$Natural_5.t<-transformar_columna(model_df$Natural_5)
model_df$Aquatic_500.t<-transformar_columna(model_df$Aquatic_500)
model_df$Cropland_500.t<-transformar_columna(model_df$Cropland_500)
model_df$Pastures.and.open.nature_500.t<-transformar_columna(model_df$Pastures.and.open.nature_500)
model_df$Urban_500.t<-transformar_columna(model_df$Urban_500)
model_df$Forest_500.t<-transformar_columna(model_df$Forest_500)
model_df$post_Emerse_pond.t<-transformar_columna(model_df$post_Emerse_pond)
```
